Detailed Description

Header for Analog Devices platform specific key slot definitions.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Ksu_Key_Slot_t

KSU key slots.

Enumerator
KSU_KEY_SLOT_DEVICE_KEY 

Device key

KSU_KEY_SLOT_GLOBAL_KEY 

Global key

KSU_KEY_SLOT_DERIVED_KEY 

Temporary key derived from other keys (e.g. for 1SP decryption)

KSU_KEY_SLOT_DECRYPTION_KEY 

ADI decryption key

KSU_KEY_SLOT_ECC_SIGN 

ECC private key for Attestation

KSU_KEY_SLOT_ECDH 

ECC private key for ECDH

KSU_KEY_SLOT_VER_INDEPENDENT_DEVICE 

Version independent device key

KSU_KEY_SLOT_VER_INDEPENDENT_GLOBAL 

Version independent global key

KSU_KEY_SLOT_FIRST 

First valid key slot, used for parameter validation

KSU_KEY_SLOT_LAST 

Last valid key slot, used for parameter validation

KSU PCR slots.

Enumerator
KSU_PCR_SLOT_0 

Platform Configuration Register 0

KSU_PCR_SLOT_1 

Platform Configuration Register 1

KSU_PCR_SLOT_FIRST 

First valid PCR slot, used for parameter validation

KSU_PCR_SLOT_LAST 

Last valid PCR slot, used for parameter validation
